Description:
IN/TWC/18/03/22/1 - You have failed to adequately control exposure of your employees to wood dust which is a known cause of 
occupational asthma as you have woodworking machinery without adequate local exhaust ventilation and
dry sweep wood dust.

 IN/TWC/18/03/22/2 - You have failed to provide health surveillance to employees liable to be exposed to wood dust, a substance 
hazardous to health that can cause occupational asthma
